title: Slicer Configuration Parameters
description: JSON Schema for validating slicer configuration parameters used in SlicerCompare. Based on Bambu Studio CLI parameter requirements from Story 1.3 spike.

layer_height.description: Layer height in mm. Common values: 0.1mm (fine), 0.2mm (standard), 0.28mm (fast)

infill_density.description: Infill density percentage. 0% = hollow, 100% = solid. Common values: 15%, 20%, 30%

support_type.description: Type of support material to generate. 'none' = no supports, 'normal' = standard grid supports, 'tree' = tree-style supports

printer_model.description: Bambu Lab printer model to target. Each model has different build volume and capabilities.

print_speed.description: Print speed in mm/s. Higher speeds reduce print time but may affect quality. Optional parameter.

nozzle_temperature.description: Nozzle temperature in Celsius. Material-dependent: PLA ~200°C, ABS ~240°C, PETG ~230°C. Optional parameter.

bed_temperature.description: Heated bed temperature in Celsius. Material-dependent: PLA ~60°C, ABS ~100°C. Optional parameter.

wall_thickness.description: Wall thickness in mm. Typically 2-4 perimeters (0.8-1.6mm for 0.4mm nozzle). Optional parameter.

top_bottom_thickness.description: Top and bottom solid layer thickness in mm. Typically 0.8-1.2mm. Optional parameter.
